title: WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 91 Anganwadi Worker & Helper Posts
description: The Women & Child Development Department, Odisha (WCD Odisha) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 91 Anganwadi Helper & Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th can apply for the WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection pro...
